field.name: summary
field.value: Helpers do not function when specified on child controller

field.name: description
field.value:
I have a parent controller (AbstractSecureController) which has the DateFormatHelper specified on it.
I have a child controller (AdminController) which has the custom helper 'MyHelper' specified on it.
No errors/exceptions are encountered, but with the above setup the MyHelper never functions. I have to move it's declaration up to the parent controller to get it to be usable by AdminController.
